name: Computer 0.8.2
description: COMPUTER is a horror game about a man who started creating his own game, but a virus appeared in his game. The game is made in the genre of horror, where you will play as a man named Alex. The game will take you to a world where you created your game, but found a virus in it and must fight it. The game has a plot and dialogues. the main characters are Alex, the main character, &&& is a virus, and Jason is the main competitor. COMPUTER game entirely in English.
